meanings.definition: The state or quality of being married.
meanings.sent1: Their nuptialities brought joy to all their friends and family.
meanings.sent2: In many cultures, nuptialities are celebrated with elaborate ceremonies.
meanings.sent3: The nuptialities of the royal couple were so grand that even the birds sang in celebration.
meanings.sent4: The bond of nuptialities between them was as strong as the roots of an ancient tree.
meanings.sent5: The nuptialities of their union shone brightly like a beacon of love.

meanings.definition: The customs, ceremonies, or practices associated with marriage.
meanings.sent1: Different cultures have unique nuptialities that reflect their traditions.
meanings.sent2: The nuptialities of the wedding included a beautiful dance performance.
meanings.sent3: The nuptialities of the small village were filled with laughter and music.
meanings.sent4: The nuptialities of their marriage were like a carefully choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The nuptialities of their special day were etched in their memories forever.
